connectWalletPage.nextFrontier: The Next Frontier of Crypto Security
connectWalletPage.protectYourCrypto: Protect your cryptocurrencies, store your private keys offline, and safeguard your assets from hackers. It’s time to achieve financial freedom in the most secure way with KeepKey.
connectWalletPage.body: 100% Free. Open Source. Community Owned. Non-Custodial. Private.
connectWalletPage.body2: Welcome to the new ShapeShift. 100% Free. Open Source. Community Owned. Non-Custodial. Private.
connectWalletPage.betaSunset: Beta has been sunset, Learn More
connectWalletPage.header: Please connect a wallet to get started

onboarding.dappsText1: The KeepKey Desktop client has a built-in DApp Store. This store allows you to discover and connect to a list of decentralized applications.
onboarding.dappsText2: KeepKey makes it easy to interact with decentralized applications. You can use our in-app browser to easily access these dApps and use our wallet-connect integration. Our in-app browser leverages the power of communities to curate the best and most reputable dApps for you.
onboarding.dappsText3: Join the ShapeShift community and use your FOX tokens to vote for the best DApps in the Pioneer DApp. Unlock exclusive benefits and rewards by being the first to track and develop dApps and assets!
onboarding.bexText1: Try the KeepKey Browser Extension to manage your crypto securely within your browser. Connect to dApps and enjoy hardware-level protection—all in one place.
onboarding.bexText2: Take control of your crypto experience with KeepKey’s Browser Extension. Seamlessly interact with dApps, safeguard your assets, and stay updated on market movements, right from your browser.
onboarding.bexText3: Upgrade your crypto management! The KeepKey Browser Extension offers simple, secure, and real-time access to your assets. Download now to experience enhanced security and streamlined dApp connectivity.
onboarding.restoreText1: BIP39 is an implementation that standardizes how wallets handle mnemonic phrases and seed phrases, which allow for account recovery in case you lose your device.
onboarding.restoreText2: A BIP39 recovery phrase is universal, meaning it can be imported into any wallet in the cryptocurrency ecosystem.
onboarding.restoreText3: Never share your recovery phrase with anyone. If you lose your recovery phrase, you will lose access to your funds.
onboarding.pinText1: Pin Entry Process uses a Cipher generated on Device.
onboarding.pinText2: Note the cipher displayed on the right represents what is displayed on device. As seen below. To enter Pin, press the location of the number of your pin from device into the Pin entry modal of the KeepKey Desktop application.

clickDapp.content: This is the content section. Highlander to replace this content with something useful

errors.unknown: There was an error submitting your passphrase
errors.empty: You are using an empty passphrase

passphrase.body: After submitting your passphrase, use the button on the KeepKey to approve it.
passphrase.bodyConfirm: Press and hold the button on the KeepKey to confirm your passphrase.

hardware.claimInterface: Other software is currently using the KeepKey.
hardware.claimInterface2: close other software and try again.
hardware.claimInterface3: Check all browser tabs. and close app.ShapeShift.com if it is open!.
hardware.claimInterface4: Disconnect, and reconnect your KeepKey to continue.
hardware.connect:
#### **To Begin**
Please connect your KeepKey to continue.

If your device is already connected, disconnect and reconnect to reset your device state.
hardware.reconnect: Please disconnect and reconnect your KeepKey to continue.
hardware.moreInfo: Still unable to connect? For more information you can read our troubleshooting guide here.

bootloader.header: Bootloader Update Required for Your KeepKey!
bootloader.cta: Your KeepKey is out of date! Let's update your bootloader.
bootloader.bootloaderNeeded: To continue, you must update your device's bootloader.
bootloader.updater: To continue, you must place your KeepKey into Firmware Update Mode.
bootloader.step3: Reconnect the device (while holding down the button) to enter Firmware Update Mode and continue.

firmware.header: Firmware Update Required for Your KeepKey!
firmware.cta: Please disconnect your KeepKey, hold down the button, and reconnect it (while holding down the button) to enter Firmware Update Mode.
firmware.firmwareNeeded: To continue, you must update your device's firmware.

label.body: Labelling each of your devices allows you to easily distinguish one from the other.

recoverySettings.recoveryPassphraseDescription: If you are unsure if your recovery sentence is protected by a passphrase, leave this off.

recoverySentence.body: On your KeepKey screen, you will see your recovery sentence. Write it down. If you lose access to the device, your assets will ONLY be accessible by this sentence.
recoverySentence.infoFirst: Its critical you write it down exactly as it appears on the KeepKey.
recoverySentence.infoSecond: Never share your recovery sentence, it grants access to all of your funds.
recoverySentence.awaitingButtonPress: Follow the steps on your KeepKey to view your Recovery Sentence. Write it down!

factoryState.body: Your KeepKey is set to factory default settings. You can create a new wallet, or restore a wallet using a Recovery Sentence.

recoverySentenceEntry.body: Using the scrambled keyboard legend on your KeepKey, enter the first 4 letters of each word. If there are less than 4 letters in the word, press Enter, hit the space bar, or click next when you're done typing.
recoverySentenceEntry.awaitingButtonPress: Follow the instructions on your KeepKey to continue.

recoverySettingUp.body: Please wait while we initialize your device and sync your addresses.

recoveryInvalid.body: The Recovery Sentence you have entered is invalid.

requestBootloaderMode.title: An update is available
requestBootloaderMode.requestUpdaterMode: To continue, you must place your KeepKey into Firmware Update Mode.
requestBootloaderMode.restart2: 3. while continuing to hold down button, plug device back in

you can press 

 Cmd + Opt + I

 Ctrl + Shift + I 

 on Windows or Linux, to trigger Developer Tools.

Are you sure?

This will remove all personal data including wallets, accounts, balances.

Verify that you have backed up your wallets before continuing.
settings.balanceThresholdTooltip: On dashboard and charts, hide balances below this value

connect.body: Connect a KeepKey device and click Pair.
connect.conflictingApp: Could not find your KeepKey. Another application may be trying to connect with your KeepKey.

pin.body: Use PIN layout shown on your device to find the location to press on the PIN pad.

newPin.body: Create a new PIN (up to 9 digits) using the cipher displayed on your KeepKey.

newPinConfirm.body: Re-enter your PIN using the cipher displayed on your KeepKey.

remove.body: Please confirm your PIN to remove the PIN from your KeepKey

descriptions.pin: The PIN is a combination of up to 9 numbers that you select after initializing your KeepKey. A PIN protects your device against unauthorized use in the event your KeepKey falls into the wrong hands.
descriptions.passphrase: Enable the ability to have multiple wallets, accessible by using a unique passphrase for each wallet.
descriptions.label: Labelling each of your devices allows you to easily distinguish one from the other.
descriptions.timeout: Your device goes to sleep after 10 minutes of activity by default. However, you can change this.
descriptions.buttonPrompt: Press and hold the button on your KeepKey to change the device %{setting}.
descriptions.updateFailed: An error occurred whilst updating the %{setting}.

passphrase.title: Use with caution
passphrase.body: If you forget your passphrase, you will lose access to your funds.

descriptions.wipeKeepKey: I understand that by wiping my KeepKey I will lose access to my funds if I don't have my recovery phrase.

confirmations.wipeKeepKey: Press and hold the button on your KeepKey to confirm the reset to factory defaults.

checkboxes.wipeKeepKey: I have backed up my recovery phrase and understand what I am doing

base.label: Base fee
base.tooltip: The base fee is set by the network and changes every 13-14 seconds depending on demand. Set the maximum price (not including priority fee) in gwei that you’re willing to pay for each unit of gas.

priority.label: Priority fee
priority.tooltip: The priority fee is an optional tip to incentivize block producers to prioritize your transaction. Set the priority fee in gwei that you’d like to pay for each unit of gas.
